VpcId.Description: VpcId of your existing Virtual Private Cloud (VPC)

FirstSubnetId.Description: First subnet ID in your Virtual Private Cloud (VPC)

SecondSubnetId.Description: Second subnet ID in your Virtual Private Cloud (VPC)

ThirdSubnetId.Description: Third subnet ID in your Virtual Private Cloud (VPC)

BuildBucket.Description: Main Bucket where the templates/scripts are installed. Do not change.

DMZSubnet.Description: This should be a public Subnet within the same VPC. This subnet will host opscenter.

SSHKeyName.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the instances

CIDRToWhitelist.Description: Internal VPC IP CIDR for internal communication for Cassandra
CIDRToWhitelist.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

RemoteAccessCIDR.Description: IP CIDR from where you could SSH into Cassandra cluster
RemoteAccessCIDR.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

InstanceType.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid EC2 instance type.

OpscenterInstanceType.Description: EC2 instance type for Opscenter. We will launch one instance.
OpscenterInstanceType.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid EC2 instance type.

FleetSize.Description: Number of Non Seed nodes in the cluster

numberofSeedServers.Description: Number of Seed nodes in the cluster. Enter a value between 1 and 3.

ClusterName.Description: The name of this Cassandra cluster

JavaVersion.ConstraintDescription: only Java7 or Java8 version allowed

CommitlogVolumeSize.Description: Size of EBS volume in GB, if creating a new one

CommitlogVolumeType.Description: Type of volume to create either new or from snapshot
CommitlogVolumeType.ConstraintDescription: must be a supported volume type: standard, io1, gp2

CommitlogVolumeIOPS.Description: Number of IOPS for volume type io1. Not used for standard volumes.

DataVolumeSize.Description: Size of EBS volume in GB, if creating a new one

DataVolumeType.Description: Type of volume to create either new or from snapshot
DataVolumeType.ConstraintDescription: must be a supported volume type: standard, io1, gp2

DataVolumeIOPS.Description: Number of IOPS for volume type io1. Not used for standard volumes.

Encryptionrequired.Description: Is Encryption required on the volumes.

KMSKeyId.Description: KMS Key Id(ARN) for encryption master key. If left null, default master key from KMS will be used.

Description.default: Choice of Instance type and number of nodes configuration
Enter the EBS volume size and IOPS settings

Label.default: S3 path containing scripts for installation

BastionInstanceType.default: Enter Instance Type for Bastion server

numberofSeedServers.default: Enter number of seed nodes to launch

RemoteAccessCIDR.default: Enter remote CIDR to allow access

CIDRToWhitelist.default: Internal CIDR IP range to whitelist

CommitlogVolumeSize.default: Enter size in GB for commit log

CommitlogVolumeIOPS.default: Enter number of IOPS required for commitlog

DataVolumeSize.default: Enter size in GB for Data volume

BuildBucket.default: Enter configuration bucket for build scripts
